caption:
If you’ve been meaning to build a website for your business but don’t know where to begin, this workshop is for you.

We’ll cover the basics, from choosing a name for your site to simple tools like Squarespace and WordPress. You’ll leave with a clearer sense of how to get your business online quickly, easily, and without needing a background in tech.

This session is part of our Business Basics Bootcamp series, offered through the Business Hub with support from the @mainetechnologyinstitute. It will be led by Nick Rimsa, a Portland-based designer who has helped launch over 50 products and worked with small businesses across Maine.

Join us Thursday, May 1 from 3:00 to 5:00 PM at 24 Preble Street, 3rd floor. Interpretation available.

Register through the link in our bio!
